data.name: Hexenringe Master Faeri
data.desc: If there is an Insect and/or Plant monster in either GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Hexenringe Master Faeri" once per turn this way. If this card you control is used as Synchro Material for an Insect or Plant monster, you can treat it as a non-Tuner.
